id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [MCP4728 Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/mcp4728.html#configuration-variables)*

store_in_eeprom.docs:
**boolean**: Use SEQ_WRITE mode to also write to EEPROM sequentially. Defaults to `false`.

*See also: [MCP4728 Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/mcp4728.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: Manually specify the I2C address of the DAC. Defaults to `0x60`.

*See also: [MCP4728 Component](https://esphome.io/components/output/mcp4728.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [MCP4728 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/mcp4728.html#id2)*

mcp4728_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [MCP4728](https://esphome.io/components/output/mcp4728.html#id1). Use this if you have multiple MCP4728 chains you want to use at the same time.

*See also: [MCP4728 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/mcp4728.html#id2)*

channel.docs:
**string**: Chose the channel of the MCP4728 chain of this output component. One of `A`, `B`, `C` or `D`.

*See also: [MCP4728 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/mcp4728.html#id2)*

vref.docs:
**string**: Chose the VREF source. One of `vdd` or `internal`. Defaults to `vdd`.

*See also: [MCP4728 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/mcp4728.html#id2)*

power_down.docs:
**string**: Chose the power down mode. In power down mode (value different from `normal`) the output pin will be connected to GND using a resistor (1kOhm, 100kOhm or 500kOhm). One of `normal`, `gnd_1k`, `gnd_100k` or `gnd_500k`. Defaults to `normal`.

*See also: [MCP4728 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/mcp4728.html#id2)*

gain.docs:
**string**: Chose the GAIN multiplier for internal VREF. One of `X1` or `X2`. Only useful when `vdd=internal`. Defaults to `X1`.

*See also: [MCP4728 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/mcp4728.html#id2)*
